Posts.EditableText: After deleting everything on my computer, then getting all the games off this site again, I noticed that a library came with the earthquake game. Then I looked through the ASL, it seems the library has no usful purpose at all. The regular coding seemed to take care of the stuff without using it what so ever. Am I just blind, or right?
